decisions.name: As_left_LV_Service_Termination_Type_decision
decisions.label: As left LV Service Termination Type

rules.name: Higher
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 4 AND 5) OR (2 AND 3 AND 5) OR (1 AND (3 OR 4) AND 6 AND 7) OR ((4 AND 6 AND 1) OR (3 AND 6 AND 2))
rules.label: Higher

rules.name: Higher2
rules.conditionLogic: (8 AND 5 AND 3) OR (8 AND 6 AND 2) OR (8 AND 7 AND 1 AND 9) OR (8 AND 7 AND 2 AND 4)
rules.label: Higher

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_Warning8
fields.fieldText: High earth loop impedance do not energise unless an RCD is fitted

fields.name: warning2
fields.fieldText: Please carry out reactive Inspection of surrounding properties

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_Warning8
fields.fieldText: Voltage is outwith statutory limits, please increase voltage

fields.name: Copy_2_of_Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_Warning8
fields.fieldText: Voltage is outwith statutory limits, please reduce voltage

fields.name: Warning5
fields.fieldText: LV service termination should be replaced immediately if possible, if not it must be planned for replacement within 28 days. Carry out reactive inspection of surrounding properties

fields.name: Warning6
fields.fieldText: Plan for replacement and carry out reactive inspection of surrounding properties

fields.name: Warning7
fields.fieldText: Plan for LV service termination installation and carry out reactive inspection of surrounding properties

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Warning8
fields.fieldText: Earthing connection must be planned for renewal
